newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Autodesk forecast raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Autodesk forecast raised.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said it raised estimates for Autodesk Inc "to be more in line with company guidance."
-- In a written statement, Hambrecht lifted its earnings estimate for fiscal 1998, ending January 1998, to $1.30/shr from $1.25 and revenue to $583.6 million from $574.5 million.
-- Autodesk reported a Q1 shr loss of $1.15 for Q1 FY98, including charges. Excluding charge, Autodesk reported a profit of $0.10/shr, "in line" with forecasts, Hambrecht said.
-- Hambrecht said the company's new R14 software product is showing early indications of strong demand, but results from its Kinetix multimedia division were disappointing.
